text: Hey Europe, let's keep up the good work! 💪🏽💚 New Eurobarometer survey shows we're on the right track with measures to tackle energy crisis, promote sustainability, and support Ukraine 🇺🇦. Let's keep investing in joint defense projects and supporting Ukraine's integration into the single market 📈🌿. And yes, we should definitely provide financial and economic support, as well as military training and equipment 💪🏽. Let's keep working together for a better future! 💕
